fields.name: primary
fields.about:
About US

  • The Syndicate a 100% Irish owned company based in Cork, has been serving both home and business users since 2005, and has grown to be one of the largest suppliers of printer consumables in Ireland.

  • Our success is based on a simple philosophy, we give our customers what they want, when they want it, at the best available prices.

  • We always offer extremely competitive pricing and follow that up with a back up service that is second to none. We beleive that the value offered by a company can only truly be known when you encounter a problem which is why all our staff are experienced in the printer and printer consumables field and are available to offer advice and guidance towards the product that best suits your needs.

  • We sincerely hope you enjoy using our website and are available to help you find the right product if required.
fields.delivery:
Delivery Information

  • FREE NATIONWIDE DELIVERY on all orders over €40 (€33.05 ex vat).
  • Orders less than €40 (€32.52 ex vat) have a small delivery charge of just €2.99. Thats real value!
  • Most orders are shipped direct from our warehouse. You will receive an email to the address you supplied with your tracking number, once the goods have been picked up by our courier. Our orders are picked up at 5pm daily.
  • Stocked items are shipped same day for orders submitted before 4pm. 95% of orders are currently shipped same day.
  • Non stocked products may have a lead time of 3-7 days depending on availability from the manufacturer. We will notify you by e-mail of any delays in product delivery.

  • A little note about deliveries (But very important)

  • All our deliveries will require a signature, so please bear in mind if you are not at home during the day the goods will not be posted through the letter box. Always select an address, be it your workplace, a friend, a neighbour that can sign for the goods. If the goods are returned to us you will have to pay a delivery charge of €4.99 for us to re-package and return them to you. If you do not wish us to re-send the goods, we will deduct our initial delivery charge of €4.99 from your refund. Just letting you know in advance.
fields.questions:
FAQs

Returns Policy

The Syndicate fully endorses and impliments the rights of the consumer under 'EU Distance Selling Directive'. With this in mind the customer is entitled to a 7 day cooling off period where the goods purchased can be returned without reason and penalty. The goods must be returned to theinkshop in the original packaging, unopened and in saleable condition. If these conditions are met we will issue a refund less the cost of delivery* within 30 days of the original order date. If you have already paid a €2.99 delivery charge, this will be taken into account when issuing the refund. Please make sure you order the correct ink cartridges for your printer. If you are unsure, pick up the phone or drop us a line and we will be glad to help. Goods ordered in error will incur a 20% restocking fee provided they are returned in original packaging and in saleable condition.
*Cost of Delivery is €4.99

I have received a faulty product

If you receive a faulty product please contact us by using any of the methods in our 'Contact us' information in the footer.
fields.terms:
Terms and Conditions

theinkshop and the facilities, services and products available thereon (the 'Website') is owned and operated by the Syndicate. For the purposes of these Terms and Conditions 'we', 'our' and 'us' refers to the Syndicate.Your use of the Website and your purchase of any products are each subject to your acceptance of these Terms and Conditions. Please ensure you read them carefully in their entirety. None of the provisions of these Terms and Conditions shall be interpreted as to deprive you of any rights you may have as a consumer under European law.Your use of the Website is entirely at your own risk.

Use of the Website

You agree not to use the Website or the Services for or in connection with any of the following activities:
  • Any purpose that is fraudulent, unlawful or prohibited by these Terms and Conditions;
  • Accessing or using the Website in and from jurisdictions which restricts or prohibits same by local law;
  • In any manner which could damage, disable, overload, flood, mailbomb, crash or impair the Website or interfere with any other party’s use and/or enjoyment of the Website. In particular, you will not post or transmit to or from the Website any unlawful, harassing, threatening, libelous, defamatory, tortuous, obscene, hateful, scandalous, inflammatory, pornographic or profane material, or any other material that could give rise to any civil or criminal liability under the law;
  • Transmitting material which may cause harm to the Syndicate systems or any other party’s computer systems, including but not limited to any material which contains viruses, Trojan horses, worms, time bombs, cancelbots or other computer programming routines or engines that are intended to damage, destroy or otherwise impair a computer’s functionality or the operation of the Website;
  • Harassing, harming or abusing another person, or contacting, advertising, soliciting, selling to any other person without their prior written consent or transmitting or relaying spam;
  • Accessing data or materials not intended for your use; logging into a server or account which you are not authorised to access; attempting to probe, scan or test the vulnerability of a system or network or to breach security or authentication measures without proper authorisation; or impersonating any person or entity, or falsely stating or otherwise misrepresenting their identity or affiliation in any way;
  • Attempting to gain unauthorised access to the Website, or any accounts, computer systems and networks connected to any Activate website, through hacking, password miming or any other means; or
  • Harvesting or otherwise collecting by any means any program material or information (including without limitation email address, phone numbers or details of other users) from the Website or monitoring, mirroring or copying any content of the Website without the prior written consent of the Syndicate.

Indemnity

You agree to indemnify and keep fully and effectively indemnified and hold the Syndicate , its officers, directors, employees, agents, subsidiaries, affiliates, suppliers and any of our third party information service providers harmless from and against any and all liabilities, claims, demands, obligations, losses, expenses, damages, penalties, actions, judgements, suits and costs of any kind or nature whatsoever (including legal costs) resulting from any violation or breach by you of these Terms and Conditions.

Links to Third Party Websites

The Website may contain links to third party websites. the Syndicate does not own or control such third party websites and only provides links to other locations on the internet for information purposes. The fact that the Syndicate provides a link to a third party site does not mean we endorse, authorise or sponsor that site. the Syndicate reserves the right at any time to terminate a link to a third party site. Your use of third party sites is subject to the terms and conditions of use contained within each of those sites. Access to any third party site through the Website is at your own risk.the Syndicate shall have no responsibility whatsoever for the accuracy of any information, data, opinions, statements made on any third party site or the security of any link or communication with the site. We have not verified the content of any such sites.

Changes in the Terms and Conditions

We may modify or terminate any facilities, services and/or Products offered through the Website from time to time, for any reason and without notice, and without liability to you, any other user or any third party. Any additions to, or enhancements of the Website and/or the Products, including the release of new Products, shall be subject to the Terms and Conditions. To the greatest extent permitted by applicable law,the Syndicate reserves the right to change the content, presentation, performance, user facilities and/or availability of any part of the Website at its sole discretion, including these Terms and Conditions from time to time. You should check the Website for any changes to the Terms and Conditions each time you access the Website. Your continued use of the Website will signify your acceptance of any revised Terms and Conditions.

Jurisdiction and Governing Law

These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Ireland, and you hereby irrevocably agree for the benefit of the Syndicate and without prejudice to the right of the Syndicate to take proceedings in relation to these Terms and Conditions before any court of competent jurisdiction, that the Courts of Ireland shall have jurisdiction to hear and determine any actions or proceedings that may arise out of or in connection with these Terms and Conditions, and for such purposes you irrevocably submit to the jurisdiction of the Courts of Ireland.

Retention of Title

the Syndicate will retain title to all products supplied to you until such items are paid for in full.

Acceptance or orders/ Card security

We validate all orders and credit/debit card details you submit on this website before your order will be accepted.Once this has been done you will receive an e-mail to the address you provided at the time of ordering. Your peace of mind is paramount to us, so with this in mind we use SAGEPAY to process all card transactions. SagePay has achieved the highest level of compliance under the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI). Sagepay adheres to the most stringent levels of fraud screening, ensuring that your CARD and PERSONAL DETAILS (ie name,address, e-mail etc) REMAIN TOTALLY SECURE throughout the whole period of the transaction process. AT NO TIME DURING OR AFTER THE TRANSACTION ARE YOUR CARD DETAILS VISIBLE TO the Syndicate OR ITS STAFF. We simply get a result from SagePay of 'denied' or 'accepted'.
fields.privacy:
The Syndicate GDPR Privacy Statement

We will not sell, distribute or lease your personal information to third parties unless we have your permission or are required by law to do so. Sometimes we may have to pass information to statutory bodies authorised to obtain data under various legislation, such as the police or relevant tax authority. Where we do seek your permission we will name the relevant third party at the time we seek such permission from you and any such permission shall be limited to that third party.

What personal information do we collect?

We may collect the following information:
Your Name
Contact Information including email address, Daily Contact number (for delivery purposes)
Demographic information such as Eircode/Postcode

What we do with the information we gather.

We require this information to understand your needs and provide you with a better service. In particular, we will use it for the following legitimate interests of our business:
  • Monitoring, recording and storing telephone or email communications for the purpose of internal training
  • To improve the quality of our customer service and in order to meet any legal and regulatory requirements
  • To improving our products and services
  • Customising our website according to your interests
  • Periodically sending you promotional mails, emails or SMS messages about new products
  • Special offers or other information which we think you may find interesting using the contact details which you have provided
  • Use your information to contact you for market research purposes
  • Contact you by phone in relation to any deliveries or orders
